Articles.Content:
This is Near Future Propulsion Mod, that adds a lot of cool new things to game. Actually there is Near Future Solar and Electric mod also which adds some more awesome stuff so you wanna try out Future Propulsion then make sure you install these two also.

Here is my first video of it, where I show argon gas tanks/engines and my created ship.

Next time I will show Liquid Hydrogen.

Thank you for this mod review. I rather watch videos than read the cryptic mod descriptions.

I consider this for my missions now...

Thank you for this mod review. I rather watch videos than read the cryptic mod descriptions.

I consider this for my missions now...

If you think so then thank you for your feedback!

And yeah you can consider that. Such a interesting mod, takes some time before sending ship to space because need to test everything.

New videos coming soon.
Here's my second video of this mod where I show liquid hydrogen tank/engines and my futuristic looking ship. Luckly I recorded this before KSP 0.24 update.
